Serialized Form

  • Package com.primary

    • Class com.primary.CaesarFrame extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • messageIsCorrect

          boolean messageIsCorrect
          Boolean value used as a flag to confirmate if the message written by the user satisfy the restrictions for its proper operation.

        • keyIsCorrect

          boolean keyIsCorrect
          Boolean value used as a flag to confirmate if the key written by the user satisfy the restrictions for its proper operation.

        • jLayeredPane1

          javax.swing.JLayeredPane jLayeredPane1
          Layered panel created to prevent frame resizing everytime a button is activated

        • keyLabel

          javax.swing.JLabel keyLabel
          Label that displays the word "Key" and the range of the key, depending on which mode is selected

        • messageLabel

          javax.swing.JLabel messageLabel
          Label that displays "Message"

        • principalPanel

          javax.swing.JPanel principalPanel
          Main panel containing every component in the class

        • sendButton

          javax.swing.JButton sendButton
          The button Send created to start the process

        • titleLabel

          javax.swing.JLabel titleLabel
          Label that displays "Caesar Cipher"

        • toggleProcess

          javax.swing.JToggleButton toggleProcess
          A toggle button created to select between ciphering or deciphering process

        • txtKey

          javax.swing.JTextField txtKey
          A text field created to input the key by the user

        • txtMessage

          javax.swing.JTextField txtMessage
          A text field created to input the message by the user

        • warningKey

          javax.swing.JLabel warningKey
          Label used for deploying warning messages related to the txtKey text field

        • warningMessage

          javax.swing.JLabel warningMessage
          Label used for deploying warning messages related to the txtMessage text field
